episode: I was driving into a parking lot and another car decided to speed up behind me, pass me and swerve to get the parking space I was going to get.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I was furious when I was driving to a business and was in the parking lot, when I spotted a space, but suddenly a car behind me decided to speed up, swerve pass me and dangerously park into my space with a risky turn.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's infuriating! What a reckless driver!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes, they broke many laws and endangered everyone around them.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Unbelievable! Did you confront them?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I did, I verbally ridiculed their reckless behavior and told them it was insane driving all for a simply parking space.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Good for you! Hope they learned a lesson.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I actually captured the whole thing on my dashcam video.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Perfect evidence! You should report them.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: That was the first thing I did as well, as I noticed a police car driving by shortly after.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Karma's quick! Did they get a ticket?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: After I showed the officer this person's reckless driving, the officer decided to fine and ticket them.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Justice served!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yea, it felt pretty good to see the law in action and to witness this person get what they deserved.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Sweet vindication!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It was very satisfying to have the law be so swift and for this stupid reckless driver get this fine and punishment.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Closure is sweet!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I hope it prevents such future incidents from occurring in the future and the driver thinks twice next time about how they should be driving responsibly.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: A valuable lesson learned!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Well that is everything I had to say about this incident, thank you for listening and providing and outlet for my thoughts.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Glad I could listen!
